subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Unicode Status
msgSnippet: ... Disagreements. No. Neither do I have any memory of discussion in 2007. So let s do the work all over again. (We either will or will not come up with the
messageBody:
On 12 Apr 2013, at 13:07, Zyggy2 <jayson@...> wrote:

> The glyph variation isn't critical for the font creation so let's use 10450 for PEA. Do you have any other disagreements with your draft? I believe I saw some discussion with J'AI.

Disagreements. No. Neither do I have any memory of discussion in 2007. So let's do the work all over again. (We either will or will not come up with the same repertoire.) I suggest that everything be unified with Shavian as glyph variants unless specific argument be given to disunify.

Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
